item.title: No More Login to Your Mv
item.description: SSH Your VM While working as software engineer, something I have grown tired of is to log into my virtual machine few times a day. It’s not a cumbersome process to add SSH key, but some of my coworkers ignored as well. Below are two commands that will speed up your life every day by a tiny bit. cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub | ssh <user>@<hostname> 'umask 0077; mkdir -p .ssh; cat >> .
